RETURNS ARE FREE AND EASY

EDITOR'S NOTES

Details

Slim or skinny, our new season denim has a streamlined silhouette. The AllSaints Firn Cigarette Jean will be your new wardrobe staple. Made in light indigo denim, washed and laundered for a vintage finish. Wear with relaxed sneakers and easy fitting tees.
  • Button fly, embroidered ramskull, leather patch, vintage gunmetal hardware
  • Regular crotch and skinny leg
  • 100% Cotton
  • Delicate wash
  • Model is 6'3", 31" waist and wears a size 30

Made in: Turkey

Waist

Measure the narrowest part of your waist.

Thigh Width

Measure around the widest part of your thigh.

Calf

Measure around the widest part of your calf, in the middle of your lower leg.

Inside Leg Length

Measure from the top of your inner tight to your ankle bone.
